entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
